enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Prerequisite: Students must have completed Chem 102 or 172 to register for this course.
title: WCAS BIOL_SCI 219-0-21 Cell Biology

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Introduction to Cell Biology. Mechanisms that cells use to compartmentalize and transport cellular materials, to move, to regulate growth and death, to communicate and to respond to their environments.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Active learning exercises, lectures. Two exams (One in finals week but not cumulative) and multiple quizzes.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
The Machinery of Life, 2nd Ed., author - David Goodsell; publisher- Copernicus/Springer;
ISBN: 978-0-387-84924-9 Ebook ISBN: 978-0-387-84925-6

Up to date Clicker
